Get in touch and join me in sunny Portugal!Learn MorePrevious NextAlexandra MendesAssistant ProfessorSoftware Reliability LabDepartamento de Engenharia Informática, Faculdade de Engenharia, Universidade do PortoBiographyI am an Assistant Professor at Department of Informatics Engineering, Faculty of Engineering, University of Porto and I co-lead the Software Reliability Lab. I am also a member of the Formal Methods Teaching Committee and a Fellow of The Higher Education Academy (HEA). In 2023, I was a Visiting Researcher at Carnegie Mellon University under the CMU Portugal Program, hosted at CyLab Security and Privacy Institute. I was a recipient of the Amazon Research Award in Automated Reasoning in the Fall 2024 call. Finally, I am also a senior researcher at INESC TEC.My research focuses on encouraging a wider adoption of software verification by creating tools and methods that hide the complexities of verifying software.
